title: Botting in Intermediate Bots
body: Has gone too far, can we please get some Riot staff playing a few games and banning bot users? usually it's 1 player and 3 bots with you having to pick up for 3 bots with the owner of said botting program. its not a fun or healthy learning environment

replies.body: Make sure you queue with at least 1 other human player... problem solved, in fact problem **enjoyed**. After you both have 6 items and win the game, then you can report the other three bots. Win/Win.
Avoiding the problem doesn't solve it.

I agree with Ttomes but not only that, sometimes you only have time to close out an intermediate bot game for that sweet daily IP bonus, or maybe you've just lost 2 normal games and have no patience to lose a third, you want something you can genuinely win whilst tilted to get it over with.
Scripters everywhere in the bot games. I had a game with all my teammates are 'script bots'. Just want to practice some new champions, and this game experience sucks
